Finally, always have a backup plan. Escape routes, burner phones, hidden stashes. If things go south, I gotta be ready to disappear without a trace. This ain't a game for the faint of heart. You gotta be ruthless, you gotta be adaptable, and you gotta be one step ahead of the game.
